# SMB Voice - Professional Business Phone Service
# https://voice.startmybusiness.us

## About SMB Voice

SMB Voice is an affordable, professional business phone system designed for small and medium businesses. We provide enterprise-grade VoIP communications at just $7.95 per month - the lowest price in the industry for a full-featured business phone.

## Key Features

- Professional Business Phone Number (local or toll-free)
- AI Receptionist - Answers calls 24/7 with natural conversation
- 5 Extensions included - Route calls to your team
- 500 AI Minutes included per month
- Unlimited US/Canada calling
- Voicemail with transcription
- Call forwarding and routing
- iOS and Android mobile apps (PWA)
- Windows and Mac desktop softphone
- SMS/Text messaging
- Call recording (optional)
- IVR Phone Menu system
- Call queues for teams
- Business hours routing

## Pricing

- **Monthly Plan**: $7.95/month
- **14-Day Free Trial**: No credit card required to start
- **No Contracts**: Cancel anytime
- **No Hidden Fees**: Price includes all standard features

## Who Is This For?

SMB Voice is perfect for:
- Small business owners who need a professional phone presence
- Freelancers and consultants
- Home-based businesses
- Startups on a budget
- Real estate agents
- Law offices
- Medical practices
- Service businesses

## Technical Information

- Platform: Cloud-based VoIP (SignalWire infrastructure)
- Protocols: SIP, WebRTC
- Apps: iOS PWA, Android PWA, Windows, Mac, Linux
- Authentication: Clerk (OAuth, email/password)
- Database: PostgreSQL (Supabase/Cognabase)

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://voice.startmybusiness.us
- **Support Email**: support@startmybusiness.us
- **Sales Phone**: 888-534-4145
- **Company**: Start My Business Inc.

## API Access

SMB Voice provides APIs for:
- Phone number management
- Call logs and analytics
- SMS messaging
- Webhook integrations
- User management

API documentation available at: https://voice.startmybusiness.us/dashboard/api-docs

## AI Policy

This service uses AI for:
- AI Receptionist (voice conversations)
- Voicemail transcription
- Call summarization

All AI interactions are disclosed to callers. Human support is always available.

## Data Privacy

- All calls are encrypted (TLS/SRTP)
- Data stored in US-based servers
- GDPR and CCPA compliant
- No data sold to third parties

---

Last updated: January 2026
Version: 1.0.0
